abstract: Min Guenther explains Swedish role in Finnish war and peace negotiations; German reaction
snippet: STOCKHOLM, April 1 (UP)--Foreign Minister Christian E. Guenther, explaining to the Riksdag (Parliament) Sweden's role in the Finnish war, said today that the Allies made their first request to send troops across Sweden and Norway to Finland on Mar...

headline.main: FINNISH WAR ROLE OF SWEDEN GIVEN; Guenther Says Allies' Request for Passage of Troops Was First Made March 2 DALADIER WIRED TO KING Refusals and Action Solely as Go-Between on Peace Terms Told by Foreign Minister

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, April 1 (UP)--Foreign Minister Christian E. Guenther, explaining to the Riksdag (Parliament) Sweden's role in the Finnish war, said today that the Allies made their first request to send troops across Sweden and Norway to Finland on March 2, five days before peace negotiations started in Moscow.
